empty.title: Welcome to ImportFlow
empty.description: There are no imports to show yet. Create your first import to get started.

warning.title: Some imports require your attention
warning.description: Check the status of ongoing imports to ensure everything proceeds smoothly.

new.name: Import name
new.dragndrop: Drag and drop your file here
new.noMoreFiles: You can upload a maximum of {numberFiles} files.
new.fileTypeError: Invalid file format for {type}. Allowed extensions: {allowed}.
new.fileUploadError: Import created, but the file could not be uploaded to storage.

empty.title: No imports found
empty.description: There are no imports in this view. Try changing filters or create a new import.

detail.fileUnavailable: The original file is not available for this import.

empty.title: Details not available
empty.description: We don’t have data for this import yet. Try again later or check overall status.

repository.localMode: You are working in local mode: data will be saved in your browser.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or was moved.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.description: An unexpected error occurred. Try again or go back to the dashboard.

warning.title: Confirm import deletion
warning.description: You're about to delete this import irreversibly. All the associated datas will be finally removed and won't be recovered.
